content: {"Name": "Red Hook Responds", "Entity_Id": 2744, "Category": "Community Meal/Soup Kitchen", "Subcategory": "Community Meal/Soup Kitchen", "Organization": "Red Hook Responds", "More_Information": "Call to verify hours of operation and to see if an appointment is required. We provide prepared meals.  Please call BEFORE 4pm to make a reservation or you can go online at https://www.redhookresponds.org/find-help-red-hook-responds/  to place a reservation online. Please note we cover all residents within the Red Hook and Rhinebeck school districts.", "Counties": ["Dutchess"], "Location": "", "Address": "7711 Albany Post Rd.", "City": "Red Hook", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12571", "Phone": "(845)640-4788", "Hours_of_Operation": "Every Sunday 5:00pm 6:30pm \\n Every Monday 5:00pm 6:30pm \\n Every Tuesday 5:00pm 6:30pm \\n Every Wednesday 5:00pm 6:30pm \\n Every Thursday 5:00pm 6:30pm \\n Every Friday 5:00pm 6:30pm \\n Every Saturday 5:00pm 6:30pm", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "https://www.redhookresponds.org/find-help-red-hook-responds/", "Coalition": 0, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.005959", "Longitude": "-73.8652712", "Last_Updated": "09-22-2023", "icon": "marker-FF715B", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
